بحقيبة واحدة فقط وبعض العملات المعدنية في جيبها،تنطلق إلى العاصمة لتصبح أقرب و اكثر خادمة شرف محبوبة للأميرة، هل تستطيع لارييت إثبات قدرتها على الحفاظ على السر؟ والأهم من ذلك، هلستكون قادرة على الفوز بمحبة روبرت القاسي والسادي؟\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/eclair1), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51679218), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5737785)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%90%ED%95%98-%EB%98%90-%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%84-%EB%A7%90%EC%95%84%EC%A3%BC%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/2428), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55795261)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/your-majesty)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%99%9B%E4%B8%8B%E9%80%99%E6%AC%A1%E8%AB%8B%E9%A5%92%E6%88%91%E4%B8%80%E5%91%BD/157)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/your-majesty-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/your-majesty-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Baginda-Tolong-Jangan-Bunuh-Saya-Lagi/3413)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/61342)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9D%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%97_%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%86%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0/178)","de":"Nach dem ungerechten Massaker des Kaisers an ihrer Familie und ihrem eigenen elenden Tod wacht Laliette Bellua im Körper ihres zwölfjährigen Ichs auf. Sofort setzt sie sich ein einziges Ziel: Sich bei Kaiser Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum einschmeicheln und ihre Familie retten. Laliettes Plan ist kinderleicht, bis auf ein klitzekleines Detail ... In der gegenwärtigen Zeit gibt sich der zukünftige Kaiser noch als Prinzessin Rapertte aus! Mit nur einem einzigen Koffer und etwas Kleingeld macht sie sich auf den Weg in die Hauptstadt, um das liebste und vertrauteste Dienstmädchen der Prinzessin zu werden. Kann Laliette ihr Geschick, ein Geheimnis zu bewahren, beweisen? Und vor allem: Wird sie es schaffen, die Gunst der unbarmherzigen und sadistischen Rapertte zu erlangen?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/eclair1), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51679218), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5737785)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%90%ED%95%98-%EB%98%90-%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%84-%EB%A7%90%EC%95%84%EC%A3%BC%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/2428), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55795261)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/your-majesty)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%99%9B%E4%B8%8B%E9%80%99%E6%AC%A1%E8%AB%8B%E9%A5%92%E6%88%91%E4%B8%80%E5%91%BD/157)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/your-majesty-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/your-majesty-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Baginda-Tolong-Jangan-Bunuh-Saya-Lagi/3413)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/61342)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9D%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%97_%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%86%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0/178)","en":"Following the emperor's unjust massacre of her family and her own miserable death, Laliette Bellua wakes up to find that she is in the body of her 12-year-old self. She immediately sets her sights on a single goal: suck up to Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum and save her family. Laliette's plan is foolproof, except for one tiny detail... In her present timeline, the future emperor is still masquerading as a princess named Rapertte! With only a single suitcase and some change in her pocket, she sets out for the capital to become the princess' closest and most beloved attendant. Can Laliette prove her ability to keep a secret? And more importantly, will she be able to win the favor of the cruel and sadistic Rapertte?\n\n---\nIt was the end of a sunny summer day. In the hands of the tyrant, father, mother, brother and my neck went under the guillotine. And when I opened my eyes, it was my 12th birthday. Before the 13-year-old young Emperor became a brutal tyrant, I had to somehow become a god next to the man.\n\n\"I'm your maid of honor, so I'll follow you.\"\n\n\"I don't have much. And I don't own you.\"\n\nTo live and to save my family, I have to be in the eyes of that tyrant who didn't believe in humanity. Only then I can live. But that horrible monster is starting to change.\n\n\"I save what I lose in my hands. So don't hurt yourself without my permission.\"\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/eclair1), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51679218), [Naver شود ، من مجبور شدم به نوعی در کنار آن مرد باشم. \"من کنیز افتخار تو هستم ، بنابراین تو را دنبال خواهم کرد.\" \"من چیز زیادی ندارم. و مالک شما نیستم.\" برای زندگی و نجات خانواده ام ، باید در چشم آن ظالم باشم که به بشریت اعتقادی نداشت. فقط در این صورت است که می توانم زندگی کنم. اما آن هیولای وحشتناک در حال تغییر است. \"من آنچه را که از دست می دهم ذخیره می کنم. بنابراین بدون اجازه من به خودت آسیب Aussitôt, elle ne se fixe qu'un objectif: obtenir les bonnes grâces de l'Empereur Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum et ainsi sauver sa famille. Le plan de Laliette est infaillible, à un détail près... À l'époque actuelle, le futur empereur se fait passer pour une princesse nommée Rapertte! Avec un seul bagage et un peu d'argent en poche, elle part pour la capitale afin de devenir la domestique préférée de la princesse. Laliette sera-t-elle en mesure de garder le secret? 강한 여름날의 죽음이었다.\n열 여덟, 폭군의 손에 아버지와 어머니, 동생, 뒤이어 내 목까지 단두대 위에서 잘려나갔다.\n\n그리고 나는 눈을 떴다.\n열 두살의 생일이었다.\n\n열 세살의 어린 황녀(?)가 잔인한 폭군 황제가 되기 전에 나는 어떻게든 저 인간 옆에 붙어 간신이 되어야 했다.\n\n\"저도 전하의 시녀니까 전하만을 따르겠어요.\"\n\"난 가진 게 별로 없어. 그리고 넌 내 것이 아니야.\"\n\n살기 위해, 가족을 구하기 위해\n인간 불신에 빠진 저 폭군의 눈에 들어야 해.\n\n그래야만 내가 살 수 있어.\n\n그런데 끔찍한 저 괴물이 점점 달라지기 시작한다.\n\n\"난 내 손에 쥔 것은 아껴. 그러니까 내 허락없이 네 몸에 상처 내지 Мне нужно выжить, находясь рядом с ним. Я стану хитрей.\n«Ваше Высочество, я ваша новая горничная, клянусь всегда следовать за вами.»\n«Ты не моя вещь.»\nЧтобы выжить и спасти свою семью, я должна суметь втереться в доверие к Императору, который утопает в недоверии к людям. Trước khi vị Hoàng đế trẻ 13 tuổi trở thành một bạo chúa tàn bạo, tôi phải nghĩ cách để trở thành một hầu cận bên cạnh người đàn ông đó. \"Em là phù dâu của anh, nên anh sẽ phải đi theo em.\" \"Ta không có thứ gì cho em cả.Và ta cũng không coi em là vật sở hữu.\" Để có thể sống sót và cứu lấy gia đình mình, tôi phải Luôn ở trong tầm mắt của tên bạo chúa không tin vào nhân loại kia. Chỉ khi đó tôi mới có thể sống. Nhưng con quái vật khủng khiếp đó đang bắt đầu thay đổi. \"Ta sẽ dành lại những thứ mà ta đã mất trong tay.Vì vậy, xin đừng tự làm tổn thương mình khi chưa được phép của ta”\n\n---\n**Original c8a0426d-539b-4f6a-9537-fbccf4962529:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c8a0426d-539b-4f6a-9537-fbccf4962529","title":{"en":"The Moon on a Rainy Night"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"雨夜の月"},{"ja-ro":"Amayo no Tsuki"},{"ko":"비 오는 밤의 달"},{"fr":"The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)"},{"de":"Der Mond in einer Regennacht"},{"pt-br":"A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa"},{"es-la":"La luna en una noche lluviosa"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id","vi","en","pt-br","ko"],"description":{"en":"One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.","ja":"2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。\n\n金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。","ko":"고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.","pt-br":"Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. c8da7141-f75b-45dc-9ab0-aad412fa50c8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c8da7141-f75b-45dc-9ab0-aad412fa50c8","title":{"en":"March Story"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"猎魔荒世录"}],"lastChapter":"24","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"“Things that should not be touched by humans somehow find their way into this world. That’s why you should never, ever touch anything that is foreign.”  \nFollow the adventures of March, a Syste Behard, who hunts ils– evil creatures that lurk in fascinating objects.  \n  \nAmong the quiet villages and towns of 18th century Europe, demons known as the Ill hide within the most beautiful works of art, sparked to life by the torment of their creators. Attracted by their jewel-like allure, the unwary find themselves possessed by the Ill and driven to horrific acts of violence. Only the hunters of the Ciste Vihad can dispel the Ill.March is one such hunter, tracking the Ill from town to town to find the antiques that contain the demons before they can possess anyone. If the worst has come to pass, March's full powers are unleashed to battle the fiendish Ill. Born of tragedy, the artifacts all have their own tales to tell, as do each of their victims. In her attempt to get over her love, she pretends as if she's about to commit suicide. However, a boy from her school, who is rumoured to be a delinquent, stops her, and promises her that he’ll introduce her to the best guy on earth. Just who is this 'best guy on earth' and where can he be found? Or is he right in front of Michiru’s eyes?  \n  \n4) Ashita Hanabi ga Agattara  \n(When There's Fireworks Tomorrow)  \nTomoe has a dreamー to go to the fireworks display during the summer together with the guy she likes. She makes the perfect plan to confess to him, but that doesn’t go as well as she had hoped, when Kagami confesses to her that he really likes Tomoe’s best friend, Rikka! Is the friendship ruined between these best friends now? And will Tomoe be able to fulfill her dream of watching the fireworks with someone she loves?  \n  \n5) Super✰Star  \nThere’s a certain group of guys in Kiyoko’s class that stands out, and to Kiyoko, Hoshino stands out the most! In fact, whenever she sees him, he looks like he’s sparkling. However, Kiyoko realises that Hoshino isn’t exactly what he seems to be, when she discovers him working at his family’s run-down convenience store! But even in his dull work clothes, Hoshino is still sparkling to her. Au moins, ils ont un cours ensemble ce semestre : les cours magistraux donnés par un professeur populaire, Seo Joohyuk.   \nQuelques heures après le premier cours, Hajoon se souvient avoir oublié son devoir en classe. Alors qu'il va rejoint l'amphithéatre, il devient témoin et complice d'une série de cours privé donné par Joo-hyuk à Eun-woo. Ces leçons libèrent ses désirs les plus profonds et les plus risqués.  \n\n\n---\n\n**Links:**  \n- [Official Japanese](https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/special_class)"},"links":{"ap":"private-lessons","engtl":"https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/private_lessons","kt":"58944","mal":"134654","mu":"157835","raw":"https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/special_class"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

c95a2a10-8963-40a6-a418-93d89b581b8a:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c95a2a10-8963-40a6-a418-93d89b581b8a","title":{"en":"Star of the Kurds"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Kurd no Hoshi"},{"en":"Rebel Sword"},{"ja":"クルドの星"},{"zh":"库德之星"}],"lastChapter":"18","relatedIdds":["f36895e4-5045-4a5c-a8ec-c073d8958433"],"description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\n\nYoshikazu Yasuhiko, the genius behind \"Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin\" has finally digitized his early masterpiece of adventure action set in the Middle Eastern powder keg of Kurdistan! Jiro Manabe, who has a Japanese father and a Kurdish mother, visits Turkey for the first time in ten years, guided by a letter from his mother, who has been separated from him.\n\nThe letter, however, was sent by Qasim, a Kurdish armed guerrilla known as \"Demirel\" (Iron Arm), to lure Jiro to Turkey. Giraud is caught up in a confrontation between Kurdish guerrillas and Turkish security forces in Istanbul, and flees to Kurdistan, a remote region in eastern Turkey.\n\nIn a secret tribal cave, Jiro meets a mysterious boy who shares the same name, \"Jiro\". Kurdistan is still at the mercy of international politics and in the midst of the ravages of war. However, the Kurdish people have not yielded to the oppression of the Turkish security forces, the chemical weapons of Saddam Hussein, the terrorism of the Islamic State, or the airstrikes of the Assad regime. \n\nThis is a valuable work that allows the reader to touch the source of their indomitable spirit. The Kurdish people are such a hardy and courageous people, but they are also people of misfortune. They are a people whose survival is constantly threatened, but they will surely continue to survive. We can only watch them in silence from afar."},"links":{"al":"109610","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B08KWPLLBT?binding=kindle_edition\u0026searchxofy=true\u0026ref_=dbs_s_aps_series_rwt_tkin\u0026qid=1670964507\u0026sr=8-1","ap":"rebel-sword","bw":"series/200033/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-131481","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/534774/A002150945/","kt":"kurd-no-hoshi","mal":"108557","mu":"16893"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

c977b0d1-32ee-49d3-88ef-fdf515962f56:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c977b0d1-32ee-49d3-88ef-fdf515962f56","title":{"en":"Locke the Superman"},"altTitles":[{"pl":"Locke Superczłowiek"},{"ja-ro":"Choujin Locke"},{"vi":"Siêu nhân Locke"},{"ja":"超人ロック"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["12edf75a-8617-48a0-b757-5faa9a6b419e"],"description":{"en":"At first glance the story is simply about Locke. He has no family name; when asked \"Locke what?\" he replies \"Just Locke.\" His genesis is before the \"Cosmic Year\" calendar used in the story. Although there are rumors that the author has an origin in mind for Locke, it is still a mystery to readers as well as to the other characters in the story. All of the stories deal either directly with Locke or with actions only slightly removed from him. The primary plot deals with Locke's involvement in struggles against evil of one sort or another—either human or quasi-supernatural. Frequently Locke is drawn into events that are happening around him. Either he stumbles onto a situation that his heart will not let him ignore, or one of the other players begs him to join their cause. Sometimes he relents and joins their cause; sometimes he ends up opposing them.  \n  \nAs the story slowly grows around the reader (and there is a lot of story!) he finds that it is a chronology of human history in the future. Locke is the medium through which we see humanity as it evolves, travels, discovers, explores, colonizes, conquers, fights, and destroys. He is the eye on humanity. He is also the will to do right."},"links":{"al":"35393","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0756ZTGRT","ap":"locke-the-superman","bw":"series/7435","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-36102","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/230336/","kt":"11305","mal":"5393","mu":"27219"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Po jej śmierci Yuuta zapisuje jej życie w formie filmu, któy pokazuje w szkole. Zdecydował się dodać odrobinę fantastyki do końcówki filmu, Bombowa Matka, dosłowną eksplozją!\n\nPo otrzymaniu negatywnych opinii, dotyczących nieprzyzwoitego sposobu przedstawienia śmierci jego matki, Yuuta idzie na dach szpitala odebrać sobie życie—ale tam spotyka dziewczynę, Eri. Oczarowana jego filmem, Eri prosi Yuutę, żeby zrobił nowy film, który doprowadzi widownię do łez i udowodni krytykom, że się mylili. Film, który zamierzają zrobić, będzie się wyróżniał, zacierając linię między faktem a fikcją. I oczywiście, to nie byłby film Yuuty, gdyby nie miał jego popisowego numeru—ciutki fantastyki. There 'Tobio' was given the new name Atom (Astro Boy). \n\nLater, he would be taken in by Professor Ochanomizu, who serves as his guardian. \n\nHuman-robot conflict occurs over and over again, and is a major driving force. Atom never gets appreciation for his work in stopping plots and conspiracies on the international and even intergalactic scale solely because he is a robot. The authorities doubt him because he is a robot. \n\nAnd as a robot, he has difficulty fully connecting with not just the humans around him (like his school friends), but even his robot family.\n\nAtom's serialization was unfinished, as the magazine it was in ceased publication. His obsession for martial arts ultimately leads him down a different path… one that few have ever dared to take. Join Mookhyang as he fights powerful masters, takes down evil forces, and pushes himself to the limit... and beyond.\n\n---\n- [Webtoon Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kK5IfJoG05Q)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cWebtoon kakao\u003e](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%94%94-%EC%98%A4%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%84/2468)","ko":"무협계 한 획을 그은 전동조 장편 소설 [묵향]! \n암살자에서 무림 정점에 오르는 묵향의 이야기가 \n초대형 웹툰 프로젝트, [묵향 디 오리진]으로 돌아온다!\n\n 수많은 세력이 패권을 다투던 드넓은 중원의 무림. 어릴 적 마교에 납치되어 암살자로 훈련받은 2044호. 고된 훈련 속에서 목숨의 위협을 넘어 치열하게 살아남은 그는 실력을 인정받아 ‘묵향’이란 이름을 얻는다.\n 그러나 묵향에게는 언제나 채워지지 않는 갈증이 있었으니, 그것은 바로 검의 길! 암살자로 사는 삶에 만족하지 못하던 그때, 묵향은 스승 ‘환사검 유백’을 만나 인생의 큰 변화를 맞이하는데! 그는 자신이 좇던 탈마의 경지에 올라 무공의 정점에 오를 수 있을까?!\n\n수많은 고수와 격돌하며 궁극의 무를 좇는 묵향!\n전설적인 일대기의 서막이 다시 열린다!!\n\n묵향 디 오리진 ⓒ 레드아이스 스튜디오(주), 전동조 / 학산문화사\n\n 이용안내\n\u003c묵향 디 오리진\u003e은 전동조 작가님의 소설 \u003c묵향\u003e의 1부의 이야기입니다.\n이어지는 \u003c묵향\u003e 2부의 스토리는 \u003c묵향 다크레이디\u003e를 검색하여 이용 부탁드립니다.\n\n---\n- [Webtoon Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kK5IfJoG05Q)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cWebtoon kakao\u003e](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%94%94-%EC%98%A4%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%84/2468)","pt-br":"Esse Mawnha se passa tempos antes do início da famosa história de MookHyang – Dark Lady. There, Alice Keating is a renowned witch with budding potential—having already mastered most types of magic. Her fate seems sealed until her husband Khalid, the terrifying archduke of Caltes, makes a cryptic promise to save her life. That’s when Idris wakes up a year earlier, on the day of her wedding, with a chance to redo it all. But while she’s grateful to be alive, her memories aren’t adding up. The Khalid she remembers was a ruthless tyrant, but the man before her now is affectionate and kind. Was their loveless marriage just a horrible dream or has Idris’s past become twisted in reality? She has no choice but to trust Khalid’s heart if she wants to survive and find out who tried to kill her.\n\n---\nIdris was forced by her family to marry the tyrant Grand Duke. She was not loved by her family because she was an illegitimate child, but she continues to have an uneasy marriage with Khalid, the tyrant. Then one day, Idris, who was stabbed on her vital point, let Khalid end her life, hoping that she'll still live. When she woke up, she came back in the past, precisely on her wedding day. But Khalid, who had never laughed before, said all sorts of sweet nothings and laughed saying that he'd do anything for her. Suddenly her tyrant husband… had changed!\n\n---\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55539262)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-husbands-reversal)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9775)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/the-tyrant-husband/list?title_no=3275)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/my-husbands-reversal-fr)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62578)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/drama/the-tyrant-husband/list?title_no=3541\u0026page=1)","es":"Idris ha sido apuñalada y está a punto de morir.
